<a name="Options"></a>
## type Options



```go
type Options struct {
    Mode            Mode
    Port            string
    DefaultSymbol   string
    DefaultRange    string
    DefaultInterval string
    // Auto-refresh seconds in TUI (0 = off)
    RefreshSeconds int
}
```
